channel.title: Crack!What schools have come to!
channel.description:
Out of all the topics they could have given me for an essay, they told me to write an essay on CRACK!!!!! What have schools come to!?!?!? Today I come home from school. My parents ask me if I have any homework and that I should go do it right now, as were all going for a family walk soon. What do I say?
K mom, I'm off to google "crack"
Imagine that...Now picture her reaction if I actully said that... :| scary...luckly those thaughts were only going thru my head when they were telling us the assingment in class... Yet again I ask: What have schools come to!!!???!!!???!!!??? :confused: :confused: :confused: 1 more thing, any1 here know some stuff about crack(I'm pretty sure at least someone is an expert. I don't know the statistics, but I'm assuming their not too low...) WHAT HAVE SCHOOLS COME TO!!!??? :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: Crack!What schools have come to!
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

O M F G:

And get fucking suspended, which will get on m permanate record, closing a great deal of carears, collages, or a higher degree, ect. for me…I’m willin to rebel against anything, anywhere, but it has to be reasonable and have relativly low consequences, cuz who how, but I dont wana throw my life away…

Get over it. If they suspend you over having your own opinion on a matter, then they really do have one track minds - I don’t agree with drugs and smoking, but I don’t say that other people can’t do that kind of thing.
Besides, what would they say? “Oh, wow. When we gave these assignments out, we expected them all to return with reasons not to do drugs, but instead someone promotes it”. You can’t get suspended for having your own opinion on a matter - just make sure that you present real and accurate facts on something, and they can’t incriminate you.
That way, when next year comes, they’ll think twice about certain topics popping up for essay styled assignments…

Read full topic
